answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects device or network information (device name, device model, Advertisement Identifiers, operating system, application version, user behaviors, language settings, resolution, mobile endpoint storage), payment result verification information, and personal information for sports and health products (gender, birthday, age, height, weight, regional information).

content: Device or network information (device name, device model, Advertisement Identifiers, operating system, application version, user behaviors, language settings, resolution, mobile endpoint storage)
Personal information for sports and health products (gender, birthday, age, height, weight, regional information)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the types of data collected by the app, ranging from device-related information to payment verification and personal details for sports and health product functionalities.
reply.reference: Device or network information, Payment result verification information, Personal information for sports and health products. URL: https://flyingfishmart.com/private/PrivatePolicy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app will use the collected information for the purposes covered by the policy and will analyze the operation of the product to ensure service security and optimize products.
reply.reference: We will use the information collected for the purposes covered by this Privacy Policy. If the scope of your personal information we intend to use exceeds the scope described in this 'Privacy Policy', we will revise the content of this 'Privacy Policy' before collecting your personal information and obtaining your express consent again. We will strictly abide by the provisions of laws and regulations and the agreement with you, and use the collected information in accordance with this 'Privacy Policy' and 'User Agreement'. We will analyze the operation of this product according to the frequency and situation of your use of the product, error information, and performance information, to ensure the security of the service, optimize our products and improve the quality of our services. URL: https://flyingfishmart.com/private/PrivatePolicy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or delete data by changing settings on their device or visiting the provider's web pages.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can disable or delete certain technologies by changing settings on their device or visiting provider web pages, indicating that users can opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: If permitted by your device or associated program, you may disable or delete the above technologies by changing your settings, or by visiting the provider's web pages. However, this action may affect your use of products and/or services. URL: https://flyingfishmart.com/private/PrivatePolicy.html

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not share personal information with third party providers.
reply.reference: We promise that we will not share, sell, reveal to 3rd party providers in other ways the information you provide with us and the information we collect from you, or collect your personal information on behalf of 3rd party providers. URL: https://flyingfishmart.com/private/PrivatePolicy.html

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with multiple third-party providers for various purposes, including data analysis, performance monitoring, in-app advertising, push notifications, and third-party login. Some of these third parties include AppsFlyer, Bugly, Firebase, AdColony, Admob, Applovin, Chartboost, Fyber, HyBid, Inmobi, Ironsource, Maio, Mintegral, MyTarget, Pubmatic, Smaato, Tapjoy, Unity, Vungle, Yandex, Pangle, Line, and OneSignal.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy document clearly states the third-party service providers that the app shares data with, including their specific purposes. These third parties cover a wide range of services such as data analysis, in-app advertising, and push notifications.
reply.reference: The app shares data with multiple third-party providers for various purposes, including data analysis, performance monitoring, in-app advertising, push notifications, and third-party login. Some of these third parties include AppsFlyer, Bugly, Firebase, AdColony, Admob, Applovin, Chartboost, Fyber, HyBid, Inmobi, Ironsource, Maio, Mintegral, MyTarget, Pubmatic, Smaato, Tapjoy, Unity, Vungle, Yandex, Pangle, Line, and OneSignal. URL: https://flyingfishmart.com/private/PrivatePolicy.html
